inventory=[{"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 31, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "red_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 15}, {"type": "leather_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 39, "index": 26}, {"type": "magenta_dye", "quantity": 12, "index": 35}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 31, "index": 36}, {"type": "strider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 61, "index": 37}, {"type": "light_blue_carpet", "quantity": 11, "index": 38}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 53, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a red banner, I need to place 6 red wool on the crafting grid and a stick in the center. Therefore, I will move one red wool to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1
